Plot: In this fantastical novel, Disney's Magic Kingdom suddenly becomes a bit eerie. Finn Whitman and four other teens have been hired as Disney World guides, but with an odd twist: With cutting-edge technology, they have been transformed into hologram projections capable of leading guests around the park. What begins as an exciting theme park job turns into a virtual nightmare as Finn and his pals attempt to thwart an uprising by a menacing group of Disney villains.
Characters: Amanda Lockhart, Lawrence Finnegan Whitman, Charlene Turner, Isabella Angelo (Willa), Terry Maybeck, Wayne Kresky, Jessica Lockhart (Jez), Dillard Cole, Dell Philby, Malificent, Blackbeard
